about_the_game:
This item set includes an avatar of L with a special outfit and accessories.
The avatar also includes unique animations which can be triggered under the right conditions!
Get one and show it off now!

*The appearance of the light-up Reindeer Nose on the avatar may vary depending on the game scene.
*Items included in the Premium Avatar cannot be unlocked via other means.
*Some avatars cannot be customized with the customization items included in the Premium Avatar.
detailed_description:
This item set includes an avatar of L with a special outfit and accessories.
The avatar also includes unique animations which can be triggered under the right conditions!
Get one and show it off now!

*The appearance of the light-up Reindeer Nose on the avatar may vary depending on the game scene.
*Items included in the Premium Avatar cannot be unlocked via other means.
*Some avatars cannot be customized with the customization items included in the Premium Avatar.
